title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Utilizing Visual Instructional Design Language

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design concepts and experience with mobile learning tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening Educational Design Competencies Using Visual Design Tools in a Smartphone-Based Microlearning Environment

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the core components of three major visual instructional design languages (E2ML, PoEML, coUML).
Learners can analyze user evaluation data and propose improvement plans to enhance visual design models by at least 20%.
Learners can create a 15-minute microlearning module using simple visual design tools in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
